title: Fastest supercomputers - number of computer cores 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Location in the x axis and Number of cores in the y axis.
Location Sunway TaihuLight  China has the highest Number of cores and Lassen United States has the lowest Number of cores.
The difference of Number of cores between the highest and lowest Location is 10361312.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of cores for 10 number of Locations.
The maximum Number of cores 10649600.0 is found at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China and the minimum is found at Lassen United States where Location is 288288.0.
